synopsis.text:
This captivating tale revolves around the lives of two office colleagues, Rena Yukuhasahi and Ryouhei Hachiya. Rena, a seemingly introverted and ordinary office lady, undergoes a remarkable transformation into a stunning beauty when she steps out of her professional attire. Caught off guard by her metamorphosis, Ryouhei, a businessman, impulsively invites her out, only to find themselves standing outside a love hotel.

Their relationship takes an unexpected turn when Ryouhei's superior tasks him with a peculiar assignment: to determine if Rena is still a virgin. Despite his initial reluctance, Ryouhei finds himself drawn to Rena's hidden charms as they spend more time together. As their affair deepens, Ryouhei struggles to balance his growing feelings for Rena and his professional relationship with his superior, who remains oblivious to their liaison.

Their clandestine encounters become more frequent, and Ryouhei finds himself captivated by Rena's unrestrained persona outside the office. However, complications arise as Ryouhei attempts to maintain his cool demeanor around his superior. This intriguing narrative, which premiered on Tokyo MX and streamed on the ComicFesta Anime Zone website, offers viewers a unique blend of romance, intrigue, and office politics.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
